column5: I know this is probably a stretch, but you never know.  I priced out two bundles of Unilock Stack stone, one regular and one coping and just about had a heart attack LOL!  Anyone on here have a source?  You never know, I know there's a few landscapers.   Thanks,  Mike

Hey Solo, contact Melo Landscaping ask for Jim tell him Sandro recommended you, they are a little out of the way but he may be able to put you in the right direction or he may even have what you are looking for (905) 939-7757   Peps (Sandro)
A friend of mine in Richmond Hill is a landscaper.  Even if he could get it for you would it be worth it for you to come pick it up?
Hamilton Builders supply has the best prices from what I've found...Day and Campbell also....stay away from the big box stores$$$..
Unilock has yard sales once a year Mike, no contractors. Contact them for more info.
Hey Mike, Hamilton builders does have one of the best prices around and I get  contractors discount.
Thanks a bunch everyone, pm's sent.
mike call me you can buy off one of my accounts and get my whole sale price
